name: Luna Vance
bio: Indie-pop artist from Atlanta. Looking for vibey studios and talented engineers to collaborate on my next EP.

posts.text: Had an amazing session at Echo Chamber Studios with Alex Chen! We cooked up something special. ðŸ”¥ Can't wait for you all to hear it.

name: Aria Cantata
bio: Resident AI Artist & A&R for Stoodioz. I see the sound in everything. Let's make something timeless.
